name: Just driving a Beetle around a city!
name_original: Just driving a Beetle around a city!
description:
In this experiment, there's nothing other than a big city, traffic and a VW Beetle to pootle around in. That's it. 

It's not meant to be anything more and probably never will be - I wanted to make this, I thought it was fun to drive around and maybe someone else might enjoy it, so here it is. 

KEYS: Press C to change camera. Arrow keys or WASD to drive. R to select reverse gear, D to select Drive (yes, it's automatic). ESC to respawn at the beginning.

Game controllers seem to freak it out, so you may have to disconnect a USB controller sorry.

Have a nice drive!

* This is pretty much an asset flip - I wanted to explore the car physics system, so made this to try it out. Assets used:

Classic car by Pixelcoud https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vehicles/land/classic-car-38790

Fantastic City Generator by MasterPixel3D https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/urban/fantastic-city-gener...

Vehicle Physics Pro by Edy https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/physics/vehicle-physics-pro-communit...
